text: It was 1989. We were only 24. I had precisely zero expectations about this going anywhere. But when he knocked on the door of my little frame house, I thought, “ Uh - oh, there is something highly likable about this person. ” By the end of dinner, I knew I wanted to marry him. Jason? He knew a year later. I have never been on Tinder, Bumble or eHarmony, but I ’ m going to create a general profile for Jason right here, based on my experience of coexisting in the same house with him for, like, 9, 490 days. First, the basics : He is 5 - foot - 10, 160 pounds, with salt - and - pepper hair and hazel eyes. The following list of attributes is in no particular order
